items.sentence: Tom told me that he was sick, which wasn't true.
Tom told me that he was having trouble sleeping.
Tom told me that he wanted to leave the company.
Tom told me that he thought he wouldn't do that.
Tom told me he thought Mary was still in Boston.
I'm only telling you this because we're friends.
What are you doing with that knife in your hand?
I can't go to work today because I have the flu.
I don't remember the last time I climbed a tree.
Tom didn't have an umbrella, so I lent him mine.
